thread.title: Hayden freshman Brooklyn Hunter takes regional tennis crown
thread.title_full: Hayden freshman Brooklyn Hunter takes regional tennis crown

author: The Capital-Journal
title: Hayden freshman Brooklyn Hunter takes regional tennis crown
text:
Hayden freshman Brooklyn Hunter takes regional tennis crown Posted: October 11, 2015 - 4:15pm By The Capital-Journal 
Hayden freshman girls tennis player Brooklyn Hunter won the singles championship in a Class 4A regional tournament at DeSoto on Saturday. Hunter went 4-0 on the day, taking four straight-set victories. The 4A state tournament will be played Friday and Saturday in Winfield. 
Hunter was the city champion in No. 1 singles and finished second in singles in the Centennial League meet.
